name: Slide Puzzle Borneo (The land below the Wind)
name_original: Slide Puzzle Borneo (The land below the Wind)
description:
Slide Puzzle game with backdrop of borneo wild life from the tropical rain forest and the deep ocean of sipadan. Explore borneo, "the land below the wind" with breathtaking imagery. This game is packed with a 100 pictures with more to come on every update. Select your level with a choice of 6 grid sizes ranging from 3x 2 to 5 x 5. Slide the tiles to form a complete picture. Test your problem solving skills today!

Animals featured in this game

Pygmy Elephant
